org.dbmaintain.script.parser.impl

Class StatementBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbmaintain.script.parser.impl.StatementBuilder

  • public class StatementBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembles SQL or stored procedure statements by processing characters one by one. It keeps track of the current parsing state and whether the current statement is complete and contains executable content.
    Author:
    Stefan Bangels, Tim Ducheyne, Filip Neven

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatementBuilder(ParsingState initialParsingState, java.util.Properties scriptParameters)
      Creates a new instance with the given parsing state as the initial state
